name: NYC docks, from the point of a deamon
name_original: NYC docks, from the point of a deamon
description:
This is a quick and quirky story of a deamon-ised young girl, bullied for her horns and goat like features her hatred bubbles and now she has had ENOUGH !

She is leaving New york by boat ,at the docks help her navigate the cargo port and board the ship- before its too late! Recommended for *INexperienced gamers. no pun intended
